t: Amazon.com : Moonlit Fly Fishing Umbra Fly Rod with Case & Sock, 3wt - 7ft 6in : Sports & Outdoors
s: I purchased both the 7' 6" 3wt and the 10' 5" 5 wt from Brandon and Moonlit, at the Fly Fishing Show. The rods have been great and worked perfectly for what I purchased them for. The 3 wt casted beautifully in a tight spot that I fish, was able to cast it out 30 feet easily.

t: The Moonlit Lunar S-Glass Is A Creek Freak's Fly Rod - Trout Unlimited
s: March 1, 2021 - I’ve been fortunate enough to ... of fly rods over the years, and I’d be lying if I told you that I didn’t like some more than others … or that I liked every rod I tried. But I’ve never gotten to test a rod in the field with the owner of the company that makes it. Until now. My friend Brandon Moon has been asking me — literally for years, now — to go fishing with him and to try out the fiberglass rods crafted by his company, Moonlit Fly ...
